project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple text-based game where the player can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view inventory, and encounter simple challenges.

task.name: Set up basic game structure (main loop and room navigation)
Implement room descriptions and navigation between rooms
Create a system for picking up items
Implement inventory management (viewing and handling inventory)
Add simple challenges or encounters (like puzzles or enemies)
Write tests for each of the implemented features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
